LanguageData.VAERoy_AngoraRabbit.label: angora rabbit
LanguageData.VAERoy_AngoraRabbit.description: Small, domestic rabbit that has developed an ability to enhance the neural heat dissipation of anyone they bond with. Unfortunately, as a side effect, it the bonded master of the angora rabbit dies, the rabbit will also die of sadness and loss.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> As long as an Angora Rabbit is bonded to a colonist, this colonist will receive a psychic connection that helps with neural heat dissipation.
LanguageData.VAERoy_AngoraRabbit.tools.1.label: head
